examples.text: the threat of a turned ankle was something they cared nothing about

definitions: (of earth) plowed or dug, so as to bring the underparts to the surface

examples.text: the smell of turned earth and burning leaves

definitions: (of a wooden object) shaped on a lathe

examples.text: a small table with turned legs made from poplar

definitions: (of a phrase or verse) expressed in a specified manner

examples.text: the carefully turned words of great writers

shortDefinitions: (of phrase or verse) expressed in specified manner

definitions: (of a type or letter) printed or set upside down

examples.text: a possible turned letter in cunning/cunuing
